paper_abstract: It is shown that if G is an elementary benzenoid graph without nice coronenes then there exists a bijective mapping from the set of subgraphs of the resonance graph R(G), that are maximal hypercubes into the set of maximal resonant sets of G. In addition to this a connection between alternating sets of G and a subgraphs of R(G) that are maximal hypercubes is presented.
paper_title: Resonant Sets of Benzenoid Graphs and Hypercubes of Their Resonance Graphs
